metadata.description: Agent AI skill sets for Symfony, Design Patterns, and Refactoring

plugins.name: symfony-virtuoso
plugins.description: All 38 Symfony component skills — APIs, code patterns, configuration, and common use cases

plugins.name: design-patterns-virtuoso
plugins.description: 26 design pattern skills — creational, structural, and behavioral patterns with PHP 8.3+ examples

plugins.name: refactoring-virtuoso
plugins.description: 89 refactoring skills — techniques, code smells, and dealing with generalization, all with PHP 8.3+ examples

plugins.name: solid-virtuoso
plugins.description: SOLID principles for object-oriented design — SRP, OCP, LSP, ISP, DIP with multi-language examples (PHP, Java, Python, TypeScript, C++)
